about_the_game:
Hi, I´m snazzans, one of the lead developers of the game. Before telling you what the game is about I wanted to say that it was realy fun making the game:
drawing logos, programming, modeling and so on. However, you may ask :

What is Escape To School?

Escape To School is an first person Puzzle-action game with strategic parts where you have to get into a weird school in the evening which is protected by a guard and cameras to get the "Exam Book" you need, because you don´t want to write the final exam you didnt study for. The goal is to get into buildings, find coins to to open the door for the item you need and buy powerups.Finaly you have to escape with the , you have found in the main building, in short time. You can find items like keys , coins and soda which will help you beat the game faster and easier. You will always have a short description of the task to do next if you dont know what to do. There are also a couple of eastereggs hidden on the map, so try to find them.

Escape To School includes a tutorial which will help you learn and understand the game, 3 different soundtracks and a credits-section where all rights are included.
There are also some settings which set the timer on/off, turns the music on/off and some which can change the mouse-sensitivity.
Try to beat your own score!
Good Luck!

legal_notice: All credits are in the ingame-credits section.
name: Escape To School

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/9/10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Escape To School is an action game where you have to get into a school and get all requiered items to leave it. There is a tutorial where you will learn the mechanics of the gameplay. The final goal is to Escape the school in short time. You can try to beat your highscore every time you are playing.
